dct_title_s: Repræsentatio processus in iudiciis civilibus et criminalibus usitati
dct_alternative_sm: Repræsentatio processvs in ivdiciis civilibus et criminalibus vsitati
dct_description_sm: View of "the process in use in courts of civil and criminal" (title translation), possibly in Ethiopia.
Shows court session with seated king, surrounding by variety of corporal punishments.
"VII." at top; VIII. Repræ." at bottom.
View indexed but no apparent key.
Possibly appears in Johann Theodore and Johann Israel de Bry's Petits voyages, Frankfurt, 1598-1613.
dct_publisher_sm: Johann Theodore and Johann Israel de Bry ,
